Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Febrile \Fe"brile\ (?; 277), a. [F. f['e]brile, from L. febris fever. See {Fever}.] Pertaining to fever; indicating fever, or derived from it; as, febrile symptoms; febrile action. --Dunglison. [1913 Webster]
febrile adj : of or relating to or characterized by fever; "a febrile reaction caused by an allergen" [syn: {feverish}] [ant: {afebrile}]
